body.name: Solar Panel for Ring Doorbell Solar Panel Camera Charger Compatible with Ring Video Doorbell 2（not for 2nd gen）, Video Doorbell 3, 3 Plus, Video Doorbell 4 and Video Doorbell Plus, Eufy Doorbell 2K
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 23 mins
features: 1. [Note]: compatible with for Video Doorbell 2,Video Doorbell 3/3+ &Video Doorbell 4.

2. Note: Some models of batteries cannot be connected to the doorbell during the charging process. Don't worry, contact us in time and we will guide you to install it. You will find that the APP does not have a rechargeable icon, don't worry, check the battery level after 1 hour, you will find that the battery level has increased.

3. When using the camera for the first time, fully charge the product before connecting the solar panel for better results. Our unique 360 degree wall-mounted allows you to easily position your solar panels in the optimal direction, ensuring maximum sunlight exposure. It comes with 10 ft /3 m cable. which can increase the conversion rate of solar energy of 21%, let your camera uninterrupted power supply.

4. 365 days of solar power: This solar panel can continuously absorb solar energy and power surveillance cameras when the sun is shining. There is no need to uninstall the camera frequently and recharge it manually.
5.Package includes -1 x solar panel, 1 x 360-degree mounting bracket, 1 x outdoor charging cable, 3 x screws and wall anchor, 1 x user manual.
body.description: [Note]: compatible with for Video Doorbell 2,Video Doorbell 3/3+ &Video Doorbell 4 Note: Some models of batteries cannot be connected to the doorbell during the charging process. Don't worry, contact us in time and we will guide you to install it. You will find that the APP does not have a rechargeable icon, don't worry, check the battery level after 1 hour, you will find that the battery level has increased. When using the camera for the first time, fully charge the product before connecting the solar panel for better results. Package includes -1 x solar panel, 1 x 360-degree mounting bracket, 10 ft outdoor charging cable, 3 x screws and wall anchor, 1 x user manual. ✅Only outdoor cameras powered by rechargeable batteries are supported. Before purchasing, check whether the camera is connected to a universal USB port. ✅[Note]: That this solar panels are not a complete replacement for a DC charger, and the efficiency of the charging depends on the intensity of the sun's rays and how fast the camera consumes power(depending on sun availability). ✅【360° Adjustable, Flexible Use 】 Solar panel Suitable for products such as rechargeable outdoor security cameras and outdoor doorbells, 360° adjustable stand and 10 ft charging cable, install the solar panel in the most direct sunlight position, provide continuous, uninterrupted power for your outdoor camera. ✅We will provide our customers with the best services and quality products to make sure the security, you won't miss any moment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s nice not to have to worry that your batteries gonna run out
reviews.reviewText: What I like about it is that you don’t have to be looking at your battery and recharging it being solar it makes it easy. It was very easy to install and it works very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No install instructions
reviews.reviewText: We installed this but something isn't working right, it's not charging. There weren't any install instructions. Our Ring has a jumper and we're not sure how the install is supposed to be done with a jumper....any suggestions? We searched the comments section but couldn't find a similar topic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No instructions.... so far so good
reviews.reviewText: No instructions to know if this is wired correctly. But works good so far

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Funciona muy bien y evita estar cambiando y cargando la batería, llegó antes de tiempo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keep my ring charged

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So since we don't have many sunny days, it was hard to tell if it was working. So my Ring got so low that I had to take down and charge it. Then we get 5 days of pure sunshine directly on the unit. Does not charge the unit as it is dropping in % every day. Of course with all of the cloudy days we had, it is now past the return point!!! 🤬🤬 so beware it does not even maintain the ring unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Did not work on my ring gen 2 doorbell camera
reviews.reviewText: Was not compatible to my Ring gen 2 camera doorbell. Cant really say if it works bc it didn't attach to my device properly. There are twin screws in the back of the doorbell camera but it appears what I needed was a solar charger that plugs into it in the little plug adapter hole ... the two screws it had at the top that these prongs fitted to did not make it charge or work with this device. I gave it three starts bc it says it was compatible and it wasn't. Although shipping and price was adequate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Needed to replace my doorbell solar charger.
